Hello & welcome to [redacted_name]â€™s Nails!
My name is [redacted_name], and Iâ€™m so excited to announce that Iâ€™m furthering my entrepreneurial career by taking my nail technician course in Grand Falls!
A little bit about me: Iâ€™m from the[redacted_info] region, my career background has been in the health industry for the last [redacted_info]. Itâ€™s always been a dream of mine to work for myself, so to add to my photography, Iâ€™ve decided to take my nail technician course, to start offering nail services in the Edmundston region. Itâ€™s a goal of mine that I wonâ€™t give up on.
As Iâ€™m in the middle of my course, Iâ€™m able to accept clients at my school in Grand Falls!
When: Wednesdayâ€™s & Thursdayâ€™s from 9-2
Where: Lafrance School of Hair Design (Grand Falls)
What: Manicures, Pedicures, Gel Application, and nail
extension application (tips)
How much: FREE! Our services are free of charge ğŸ¤
As I look to practice, and help others achieve self care & love, I hope to meet many beautiful souls, and begin building my clientele. If you wish to book a service with me, you may do so by simply sending me a message.
Please spread the word, like, and share as I embark my journey âœ¨
Kindly appreciated,
R[redacted_name]ğŸ¤
